alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LANCASTER AND SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Willow Street, moving north at 20 mph. Other storms were just to the north of this storm. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Lititz, Millersville, Willow Street, East Petersburg, Leola, Paradise, Strasburg, Quarryville, Leacock, Smithville, Holtwood, Sunnyburn, Shenks Ferry, Safe Harbor, Bareville, Susquehanna Trails, Lampeter, Intercourse and Conestoga. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
